message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI 

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques to quantify the similarity between opinions. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves unsupervised and supervised learning, which falls under the categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves information retrieval techniques, which falls under the category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper deals with public policy and governance, which falls under the category of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
